content:
Seveda se ne gre slepiti, da korporacije nimajo koristi s takšnimi
akcijami, se mi pa vseeno zdijo vredne pohvale. Če kupec dobi
rdečega iPoda za isto ceno kot belega ali črnega in gre res del
kupnine v dobrodelne namene so (pri)dobili vsi. Še bolj očitno to
velja za rdečo kartico Amex. Žal je pri nas ni mogoče dobiti. Nad
tem bi se veljalo zamisliti!
author: anon-20127

content:
Bono, the rock star and campaigner against Third World debt, is
asking the Irish government to contribute more to Africa. At the
same time, he's reducing tax payments that could help fund that
aid.

www.slate.com/id/2152580/


PS. Slate je left leaning medij.
author: anon-10743
